snippet: The president, Mark Emmert, and organization officials said an overhaul would look to give the power conferences the autonomy to provide some things athletes in a unionization effort are seeking.
abstract: NCAA expects its membership to approve a template for overhaul that would give athletes at least some of the benefits they are seeking in hopes of staving off the union effort; basic idea is to give autonomy to the five so-called power conferences in college athletics, allowing them to provide additional benefits to their athletes.
lead_paragraph: The president, Mark Emmert, and organization officials said an overhaul would look to give the power conferences the autonomy to provide some things athletes in a unionization effort are seeking.

headline.main: N.C.A.A. Planning to Address Benefits for Some of Its Players, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: N.C.A.A. Planning to Address Benefits for Some of Its Players, Officials Say
